si.title: ශ්රී ලාංකිකයන් සමඟ නැව්ගත කළ නැවක් මත ගත් වීඩියෝව

en.title: Video taken on a shipped ship with Sri Lankans

summary_lines: A video showcases life aboard a cargo ship carrying Sri Lankan workers. It highlights their daily routines, interactions, and the challenges they face during long voyages.
